page.title: 16FASHION:THORNTON CLEVELEYS.
page.content: THE LATEST FASHION OF TODAY VARIES.THERE ARE TWO TYPES OF FASHION,MANY PEOPLE SEEM TO LIKE TIGHT MINI SKIRTS,AND HIGH HEELED SHOES.BUT THE FASHION THAT IS REALLY IN ARE THINGS LIKE VERY LONG SKIRTS AND BAGGY OVER SHIRTS,FOR THE LADIES,AND THE MEN SEEM TO LIKE WEARING SPORTS WEAR AND BAGGY TROUSERS IN DARK COLOURS. AND THEN YOU GET THE PEOPLE WHO GO MAD AND PUT LOTS OF MAKEUP AND JEWELLERY ON.SOME PEOPLE PREFER TO JUST STAY NORMAL AND JUST WEAR PLAIN JEANS AND T-SHIRTS.IN AMERICA THERE IS NO REAL FASHION,BUT MOST OF THEM WEAR FLARED TROUSERS.FLARED TROUSERS ARE COMING BACK INTO FASHION.WE MADE A CHART AND MOST GIRLS IN OUR CLASS SEEM TO LIKE BAGGY CLOTHES. BY{FIONA LESLIE AND LOUISE HUNT.}
